channel.title: Recent posts to Increase XZ Compression in Java
channel.description: Recent posts to Increase XZ Compression in Java

item.title: Increase XZ Compression in Java
item.description:
The simplest thing is to change the preset level, although the levels higher than the default (6) help only if the file is bigger than eight megabytes. There are some advanced options that can be tweaked but usually they don't help much. See LZMA2Options.

With some specific types of files, using a filter before LZMA2 can help a little. For example, for x86 executables the x86 BCJ filter may help.
item.dc:creator: Lasse Collin

item.title: Increase XZ Compression in Java
item.description:
I'm a beginner to compression. I downloaded the XZ for java and i have implemented it and the compression is working quite well but is there anyway i can increase the compression by changing the options or something
Thank You
item.dc:creator: Sooraj dube
